N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 320.4 - Therapeutic Behavioral Unit

State Regulations

The therapeutic behavioral unit (TBU) provides services to
female incarcerated individuals who are currently diagnosed with a serious
mental illness who, due to their behavior, are serving a confinement sanction. The incarcerated individuals are offered seven hours of out-of-cell programming
which includes four hours of structured out-of-cell therapeutic programming
along with three hours out-of-cell congregate programming, services, treatment, recreation, activities, and/or meals, with an additional one hour of recreation
for a total of seven hours out-of-cell on a daily basis. Notes
